bs-pageassignments-desc: Enables you to assign users or groups to a page
bs-pageassignments-api-error-insert: Assignment "$1" for "$2" could not be saved
log-description-bs-pageassignments: Log of the changes on the page assignments
logentry-bs-pageassignments-remove-user: $1 {{GENDER:$2|removed}} the assignment of the page "$3" for {{GENDER:$4|the user}} "$4"
logentry-bs-pageassignments-remove-group: $1 {{GENDER:$2|removed}} the assignment for the group "$4" from the page "$3"
logentry-bs-pageassignments-remove-speci: $1 removed the assignment of "Everyone" for page "$3"
echo-pref-tooltip-bs-pageassignments-act: Notify me when I am (or a group I belong to is) assigned to a page, or my assignment is removed
bs-pageassignments-notification-reason-u: You are assigned directly to the page
bs-pageassignments-notification-reason-g: You are a member of {{PLURAL:$1|the group|the groups}}: $2
notification-bs-pageassignments-assignme: Your assignment to the page $2 was {{GENDER:$1|removed}} by $1.
notification-bs-pageassignments-user-gro: {{GENDER:$6|You have been}} added to the {{PLURAL:$5|group|groups}} {{PLURAL:$5|$4|$4}} that {{PLURAL:$5|has|have}} pages assigned to {{PLURAL:$5|it|them}}
Added to {{PLURAL:$5|a group|groups}} that {{PLURAL:$5|has|have}} pages assigned to {{PLURAL:$5|it|them}}
{{GENDER:$6|You have been}} added to the {{PLURAL:$5|group|groups}} {{PLURAL:$5|$4|$4}}, that {{PLURAL:$5|has|have}} pages assigned to {{PLURAL:$5|it|them}}. Please check your assignment on $3.
{{GENDER:$6|You have been}} removed from the {{PLURAL:$5|group|groups}} {{PLURAL:$5|$4|$4}}, which {{PLURAL:$5|has|have}} pages assigned to {{PLURAL:$5|it|them}}
Removed from {{PLURAL:$5|group|groups}} {{PLURAL:$5|$4|$4}}, that {{PLURAL:$5|has|have}} pages assigned to {{PLURAL:$5|it|them}}
{{GENDER:$6|You have been}} removed from the {{PLURAL:$5|group|groups}} {{PLURAL:$5|$4|$4}}, that {{PLURAL:$5|has|have}} pages assigned to {{PLURAL:$5|it|them}}. Please check your assignment on $3.
bs-pageassignments-pref-lockdowngroups: Groups that get locked down for a page when the user is not assigned
bs-pageassignments-yourassignmentsdesc: List of pages which you are assigned to.
action-pageassignable: appear in the list of assignable users
right-pageassignable: Appear in the list of assignable users
action-pageassignments: edit the assignments of a page
right-pageassignments: Edit the assignments of a page
apihelp-bs-pageassignment-store-descript: Returns assignments of the specific page
apihelp-bs-pageassignment-store-summary: Returns assignments of the specific page
apihelp-bs-mypageassignment-store-descri: Returns pages assigned to current user
apihelp-bs-mypageassignment-store-summar: Returns pages assigned to current user
apihelp-bs-pageassignment-tasks-descript: Get or edit the list of assignments for specific page
apihelp-bs-pageassignment-tasks-summary: Get or edit the list of assignments for specific page
bs-pageassignments-secure-lockdown-reaso: The action "$1" is only available for the {{PLURAL:$2|assignee|assignees}} $3
bs-pageassignments-group-lockdown-reason: You are not assigned to the page $1
bs-pageassignments-book-assignment-not-a: Assignments are not allowed for non title-based books
